text: @JoeBiden If it's for the betterment of society, and to get those stupid Karens to shut up, then yes, I agree.  But if millions more die, we know who to blame.  Yes, the epicenter of the coronavirus:  China.  The ignorant Donald Trump.  Everyone who blatantly disregards others' safety.
